name: rtf-to-docx
title: RTF to Word Converter
description: Convert Rich Text Format (RTF) documents to Microsoft Word (DOCX) format
content:
Overview

This application converts RTF (Rich Text Format) documents into Microsoft Word DOCX format. Built using pypandoc, it preserves formatting, styles, and document structure during conversion.

Features

  • Convert RTF to DOCX format
  • Preserve formatting and styles
  • Maintain document structure
  • Automatic pandoc installation

Parameters

  • RTF File: Upload your RTF file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a Word document (.docx) with the same base name as the input RTF file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting legacy RTF documents to modern Word format
  • Standardizing document formats across systems
  • Preparing documents for Microsoft Office workflows
  • Document format migration projects
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps_$$$$PPID"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/rtf_to_docx.py" "${rtfPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
